description: Protectors of Obscuria who live in harmony with the canyon's mysteries. Monster Rangers scout, survive, and defend using wit, wilderness skills, and mystical bonds with the creatures they befriend.
weapons_note: Unit costs include standard-issue weapons. Weapon abilities and properties are defined in core rules. Upgradeable weapons (like Harpoons) have additional point costs listed in optional_upgrades.

faction_features.name: Befriend Monsters
faction_features.effect: Monster Rangers can befriend monsters using Pocket Snacks (contested Quality rolls) or specialized befriending abilities (Befriend Beast, Befriend Bloodless, Befriend Spirits, Befriend Automat, Befriend Kaiju). Befriended monsters activate with Rangers.

faction_features.name: Branch System
faction_features.effect: Rangers belong to different Branches (Crow, Conjure Guard, Doom Mime, Signal, Skull, Yokai, etc.) which grant thematic abilities and playstyles.

faction_features.name: Diverse Specialists
faction_features.effect: Monster Rangers field incredible variety: stealth scouts, mystic casters, medics, mechanics, psychics, undead caretakers, titan specialists, flying daredevils, and more.

units.name: Core Ranger
units.lore: Field-trained Monster Ranger infantry from the land branches. Signature tool: hatchet, equal parts weapon and working tool.
units.tactics: Baseline skirmisher. Thrown hatchets for short-range pressure, finish in melee.

units.name: Conjure Guard
units.lore: Mystic protectors who focus on Witch Stitches - systematic warding using thread and needle. Understand we are deeply linked like thread.
units.tactics: Position centrally for Shield Aura (+1 Defense to allies within 6"). Hex debuffs enemies (-1 Quality). Witch Stitching ward (5+ ignore first damage per activation).

optional_upgrades.name: Fire Hat
optional_upgrades.effect: Replace Shield Aura and Hex with Blast and Fear. Become offensive fire caster.

optional_upgrades.name: Gas Mask
optional_upgrades.effect: Protective eyewear and respirator. Immune to Coffin Cough environmental penalty and Blinding effects (like Ink Bomb).

optional_upgrades.name: Witch-Stitched Armor
optional_upgrades.effect: +1 Defense. Counts as Light Armor. Does not reduce movement or prevent Flying.

optional_upgrades.name: Pocket Snacks
optional_upgrades.effect: Once per game, when this unit attempts a Befriend action against a creature of a Monster Type it is trained to Befriend, it may use Pocket Snacks. Using Pocket Snacks consumes the item immediately. The Befriend attempt is delayed: Round 1 is spent feeding, placating, or preparing the creature. In Round 2, resolve the Befriend roll normally. If the result is a tie, treat it as a win for the Ranger. Pocket Snacks have no effect on Peerless creatures.

units.name: Dark Librarian
units.lore: Study, catalog, and protect Monster Ranger knowledge. Arcane repositories of legends, stories, Formulae. Motto: 'You are what you know.'
units.tactics: Backline support. (1) Purify hazardous terrain (12" radius, once per game), (2) Boost befriend vs chosen monster type (+1 die within 12"), (3) Amplify Conjure Guards (extend range/area +6"/+3").

units.name: Yokai Ranger
units.lore: Specialize in Yokai and Kaiju. Started 1909 when Baron Davis visited Osaka. 5000+ Yokai Rangers in Japan. Regimented scholarly approach. 'Kaiju Corps' - ultimate Titan specialists.
units.tactics: Titan specialist. Befriend Kaiju with +2 dice (Q3+2 = 5 dice vs Q6!). Kaiju Calming Ritual: 2-turn ritual to shrink rampaging Kaiju for +3 VP. Yokai Knowledge: +1 die aura vs Titans.

units.tactics: Pressure engine (Brute role). Stealth + Fear creates board denial. Commits to combat, grinds enemies down. Makes bad decisions unavoidable.

units.lore: Deep sea divers in heavy pressure suits. The suit is their temple - rarely removed. Sea Rangers adapted to deep pressure. Electro-tridents crackle with Pierce energy.
units.tactics: Front-line tank. D5 + Tougher = roll 2 dice per damage (5+ ignores). Pierce cuts armor. Slow (4") but unstoppable. Park on objectives.

optional_upgrades.name: Harpoons
optional_upgrades.effect: Gain Ranged 10" attack. 14" total threat range (4" move + 10" range). Trained hunters.

units.name: Signal Ranger
units.lore: Messengers and flag-bearers. Lead Calamity Parades, use Radio technology. Some jam Monsterology Dynamo equipment. First: Ivan Kularak, Trolla with 19ft banner pole!
units.tactics: Standard leader (Inspire +1 die, Rally morale). Save Calamity Parade for decisive moment (+3" Move, +1 Quality, Fearless for 1 round, 6" aura). Radiomancer Jam disrupts tech heroes (24", jam Jagers/Haxans/Iron Diplomats).

units.lore: Ancient sect (500+ years). Care for Bloodless: Haunts, Vampires, Embalma, Rotters. Founded by Joh Woefix. Cemetery caretakers. Only wear black, smell like earth, see beauty in death.
units.tactics: Durable undead specialist (D3 + Tougher + Fearless). Befriend Bloodless (contested vs undead). Haunt Candy tokens (3): buff, heal, or reroll befriend. Thrice-Blessed Shovel with Brutal Blow.

units.name: Cargo Tiger Truck
units.lore: Cargo Tiger shipping company - nation's first motorized freight (1903). 27 trucks, 88 wagons, 1 steam engine. Can burn Thyr crystals for boosts. Hard-working Rangers drive into battle.
units.tactics: Fast platform (12" Move with Fast!). Load Rangers/objectives for transport. Park for Mobile Cover (+1 Defense aura). Grapple enemies (pull 3"). Thyr Boiler (once per game): +4" Move OR +2 Quality OR ignore terrain.

optional_upgrades.name: Reinforced Cab
optional_upgrades.effect: +1 Defense (D4→D5), -1" Move (10"→9"). Armored plating.

optional_upgrades.name: Extra Storage
optional_upgrades.effect: Additional cargo rigging. Increase capacity: +2 Rangers OR +1 objective. Total: 6 Rangers OR 3 objectives.
